name: Kingdra
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

attacks.name: Genetic Memory
attacks.effect: Use any attack from Kingdra’s Basic Pokémon card or Evolution card. (Kingdra doesn’t have to pay for that attack’s Energy cost.)

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any, and discard it. If both are tails, this attack does nothing (not even damage).
